member.name: P:RAE_Coil.clsBaseCoil.CoilType
member.summary: Returns the Coil Type constant. 1=CD,2=FL,4=FLc,8=FLh,16=DX_REF,32=DX_AC,64=ST,128=STDIST (COIL_CONDENSER,COIL_FLUID,COIL_FLUID_COOLING,COIL_FLUID_HEATING,COIL_DX_REF,COIL_DX_AC,COIL_STEAM,COIL_STEAM_DIST)
member.returns: Integer value Coil Type = COIL_CONDENSER As Long = 1
member.remarks:
Used in the xxx_Fin_Tube_FV.xls
Public Const COIL_ALL As Long = 255
Public Const COIL_CONDENSER As Long = 1
Public Const COIL_FLUID As Long = 2
Public Const COIL_FLUID_COOLING As Long = 4
Public Const COIL_FLUID_HEATING As Long = 8
Public Const COIL_DX_REF As Long = 16
Public Const COIL_DX_AC As Long = 32
Public Const COIL_STEAM As Long = 64
Public Const COIL_STEAM_DIST As Long = 128

member.name: P:RAE_Coil.clsCondenser.ExecutionMode
member.summary:
Calculation Type "S"elect, "R"ate, re"C"laim, "L"eaving Ref Temp.
"S"elect - Return optimal and nearest coil configurations that meet specified Target Capacity.
"R"ate - Rate coil using specified configuration.
re"C"laim - Draw "some" of the heat off before going to actual Condenser coil.
"L"eaving Ref Temp - Specify a Target Leaving Refrigerant Temperature.

member.name: P:RAE_Coil.clsEvap.CoilModelName
member.summary: Builds the Model Name of the coil. (58W-30x60-10-4-W-H-R)
member.returns:
Builds the Model Name of the coil. (58W-30x60-10-4-W-H-R)
"58" - Tube size
"E" - Coil Type - Evaporator
"30x60" - FH x FL
"10" - FPI
"4" - RowsDeep
"W" - Fin Type
"H" - CircuitFraction
"R" - Coil Hand
